scripts.build-win: cd ..\client\ && grunt build && xcopy dist ..\server\dist /S /I /Y && cd ..\server && electron-packager . uMaster --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.37.2 --asar=true && xcopy ..\scripts uMaster-win32-ia32\resources\scripts /S /I /Y && move uMaster-win32-ia32 ..\..\ && rd /s /q dist
